response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose a transaction price of $950,000. This offer aims to strike a balance between fair compensation for us and an advantageous deal for you. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 950000}
